title: Logo Font from the early 90s
content:
Can anyone here spot which font has been used to create the attached logo?

It was created by a Danish ad agency in the early 90s.

Best regards  
Søren

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [unknownfont.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20130320020953/http:/typophile.com/files/unknownfont.pdf) | 96.26 KB |
author: shaagerup

comments.content: Hard to say, heavily stretched and not so many distinctive letters. May be [Franklin Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130320020953/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/franklin+gothic)...
